content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, the event you organized... {A拍手}was <style=SizeBig>a huge success!</style>
info: 完成餐厅2-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Everyone asked me to pass along their thanks. They said sharing tasty food and chatting with others was the best, most relaxing part of their day.
info: 完成餐厅2-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Here's a little thank-you from them. I hope you'll accept it!
info: 完成餐厅2-莫白_主流程文本3

content: {A笑哈哈}You're the reason they decided to call this place home, so we want you to be part of each and every happy moment, too...
info: 完成餐厅2-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Hoho! This jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> is now full. Here, take it. Use it to water the Luca Arbor.
